full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Laundry and Dry Cleaning Services
[Section reflects the title-titre-eng AND title-titre-fra fields.]

**Tender Identification**

* **Reference Number**: WS3596236967-Doc3607946322
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3596236967
* **Publication Date**: August 25, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 9, 2022 at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Amendment Date**: September 1, 2022
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
* **Tender Status**: Expired

**Procurement Information**

* **Procurement Category**: Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: The procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Supply Requirements**

* **UNSPC Codes**: 47131811 - Laundry products, and 52141600 - Domestic laundry appliances and supplies.
* **Description of Goods**: The Contractor shall provide laundry and dry cleaning services on an “as and when” requested basis.

**Contract Details**

* **Period of Performance**: The period for making call-ups against the Standing Offer is from the date of issuance of the Standing Offer to March 31, 2024, with options to extend the Standing Offer by three additional one-year periods.
* **Buyer’s Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Buyer’s Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Key Documents**
The following documents are available on the Buyandsell GC site:
* Amendment to the Request for Standing Offer

**Inquiries and Submissions**
For any inquiries, contact Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC) by email at [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Submissions must be made in electronic format only and shall be received by the due date. Late submissions will not be considered.
